summary: A woman given to us as a "trinkerin" is having a special tour in Berlin, she bought herself a single way ticket, and start drinking everywhere she can....
cast: Tabea Blumenschein|Lutze|Magdalena Montezuma|Orpha Termin|Monika von Cube|Paul Glauer|Nina Hagen|Günter Meisner|Kurt Raab|Volker Spengler|Eddie Constantine|Ginka Steinwachs|Mercedes Vostell|Wolf Vostell|Raúl Gimenez|Ila von Hasperg|Martin Kippenberger|Ulrike Ottinger
title: Bildnis einer Trinkerin
